mapper.select: SELECT AA.ORG_CONTACT_REL_ID orgContactRelId, AA.PERSONNEL_ID personId, AA.PSN_NAME psnName, TCT.CONTENT mobile FROM (SELECT A.ORG_CONTACT_REL_ID, B.PERSONNEL_ID, B.PSN_NAME FROM TB_ORG_CONTACT_REL A, TB_PERSONNEL B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.PERSONNEL_ID = B.PERSONNEL_ID AND A.ORG_ID=#{psonOrgVo.orgId}) AA LEFT JOIN TB_CONTACT TCT ON TCT.PERSONNEL_ID = AA.PERSONNEL_ID AND TCT.CONTACT_TYPE = '1' AND TCT.STATUS_CD = '1000'

SELECT AA.ORG_CONTACT_REL_ID orgContactRelId, AA.PERSONNEL_ID personId, AA.PSN_NAME psnName, TCT.CONTENT mobile FROM (SELECT A.ORG_CONTACT_REL_ID, B.PERSONNEL_ID, B.PSN_NAME FROM TB_ORG_CONTACT_REL A, TB_PERSONNEL B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.PERSONNEL_ID = B.PERSONNEL_ID AND A.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) AA LEFT JOIN TB_CONTACT TCT ON TCT.PERSONNEL_ID = AA.PERSONNEL_ID AND TCT.CONTACT_TYPE = '1' AND TCT.STATUS_CD = '1000'
